resources.string: Most extra features added into Syberia Project
Battery options and status bar icons to disable
Basic system settings of your device
Information about the team and maintainers
Customize various features for notification panel
Press on color below to apply
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Select what to show when you press the power button
When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Number of icons left and right
Number of icons up and down
Enable lockscreen notifications with semi-transparent backgrounds
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Double tap trigger doze instead of wake
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Hides the global actions menu on secure lockscreen
Show weather information on lockscreen and during doze
Setup icon pack and weather service
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Display a notification when android debugging is enabled
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Show media cover art as the lockscreen background
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Show light pulse on new notification
Show light pulse on new notification using always on
Hide all other display elements from always on
Sets the ambient light animation duration
Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Keep UDFPS enabled when the screen is off
Disable Night Light when showing UDFPS
Disable Night Light on lock screen if UDFPS is active. Disabling this option might affect your fingerprint accuracy with Night Light on.
Adjust brightness by sliding across statusbar
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Display status bar on the lockscreen
Choose the style of your statusbar icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Allow accessing quick settings on secure lockscreen
Enable UI background blur (expensive for GPU renderer)
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Disable auto brightness when entering game mode
Display the notification content in the form of danmaku in the game
Choose the application that you want to launch with a floating ball
Show menu overlay when game is running. If this option is disabled, some game mode features will be disabled, such as Danmaku notifications
Adjust performance level when starting game
Do not allow floating notification and conversation bubbles other than incoming calls and alarms
Turn off the ringing of incoming calls and notifications in gaming mode
Answer calls automatically in the game and hands free when no headphones connected
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Automatically filter notifications such as download progress
Replace clear all notification text with floating button
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Pulldown status bar from right side
Pulldown status bar from left side
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Display an animation along the edges of the screen when pulsing
Whether to show edge light whenever ambient display is shown and not just for notifications
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
Apps will require fingerprint authentication to launch
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed when app is locked out. Existing notifications as well as new notifications will be redacted.
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers. \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Show label below icon instead next to icon
Use custom color for monet engine instead of wallpaper colors
Spoof device as a high-end model in certain games, to unlock higher FPS
Allow running multiple instances of the same application in parallel
Display and customize current network traffic levels
Hide the traffic monitor when inactive
Duration after which speed is remeasured
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
